Container
=========

JavaScript
----------

.. js:function:: Plugins.fn.container_aspectratio(adjust, factor)

   Keeps the aspect ratio of an element.

   :param string adjust: ``"width"`` (width is adjusted to height) or ``"height"`` (height is adjusted to width) 

   :param float factor: The relative width. (adjusted = factor * other)

   :returns: An object providing enable and disable functions.
